title: Triplet Falls Rainforest Walk Route

images.caption: Triplet Falls

images.title: Nina Spiess, CC BY-SA 4.0 <https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/4.0>, via Wikimedia Commons
images.caption: Pied currawong Strepera graculina on the walk to Triplet Falls.

description: This walk follows the trails around the lovely Triplet Falls in Victoria's Otway National Park. The three falls cascade over a lush rainforest to the floor of the valley. The falls are surrounded by a beautiful forest of Mountain Ash and Myrtle Beech trees. There's a nice woodland walking trail to follow around the falls with the sound of the rushing water and lush vegetation to enjoy on the way. There's also an elevated viewing platform from which you can view the falls through the trees. The falls are located a short distance from the wonderful Otway Treetop Walk . You can follow the Phillips Track north a short distance to visit the site. Here you can enjoy a walk along the longest and highest steel canopy walkway in the world.
